A River Runs Through It is based on the true story of two fly fishing brothers, Norman and Paul, (Brad Pitt and Craig Sheffer) whose Reverend father ( Tom Skerritt ) tries to teach them life’s lessons by way of Fly Fishing. Comedy and drama with sprinkles of justifiable violence.
Based on real life events it is not for the faint hearted but will give you a brilliant insight into the world of Fly Fishing.

Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie centers around Miyazawa’s life beginning with his kindergarten days and carries forward to his adulthood. The film ultimately focuses on his poignant period when the tuberculosis made him walk along the edge of life.
